Text:
Did you ever stop and think that maybe the government wants the people to believe in these nutjob theories? "Oh my god look at the government, it's so strong and powerful, just look at this huge conspiracy they set up without anybody getting a whiff of this! Its just plain useless to try to resist them, lets just sit back and let true patriots like Alex Jones and Pinocchio defend us." 

Get off your fat asses and fight for your rights idiots, no one is going to fight in your place. Read, discuss, organize and demonstrate!

The only Nut-Job is you I-Rule. You have your head in the sand or up your ass. Either way you're full of shit and have the brain of a worm. The FACTS ARE OUT THERE FOR EVERYONE WHO IS WILLING TO OPEN THEIR EYES TO SEE.
